name: Ximdesk
overview:
Ximdesk is a social platform, designed specifically for group creation, knowledge sharing, collaboration and innovation.

The goal of Ximdesk is to allow professional users to set up social collaborative environments from which they can work, interact and share information.

Ximdesk is available as a subscription web-based service and enterprise version for large organizations, government, and education.

milestones.source_text:
Launched on June 16th, 2008, Ximdesk.com is a web-enabled, subscription-based social media platform, designed specifically for group working, knowledge sharing, collaboration and innovation.

Ximdesk members have access to advanced group functionality and a comprehensive suite of social media tools and web-based business applications from which they can work and collaborate within a secure, trust-conscious, advertising-free, feature-rich, enterprise-oriented environment. Aimed at the emerging â€˜social media for enterpriseâ€™ market, Ximdesk provides a business-centric alternative to â€˜openâ€™ public social media platforms such as â€˜Facebookâ€™, or professional networking services like â€˜LinkedInâ€™.

Ximdesk transforms the way workers interact and share information and is an ideal platform from which to explore the potential of social media within business and learning environments.
